src_original: atha khalv āyuṣmāñ  chāriputra mahāprajño dharmasenāpatir vibhuḥ /
tgt_original: 大智舍利弗，能隨佛轉法輪，佛法之大將，
「世尊！ 如前後經中說，彌勒當下作佛，願欲廣聞彌勒功德、神力、國土莊嚴之事。

src_original: udadhis tena kālena dvātriṃśatśatayojanaḥ /  śoṣam āyāsyate yasmāc cakravartī yathā hy asau // MvyK_5 //
tgt_original: 四大海水，以漸減少三千由旬；

src_original: daśayojanasāhasrā jambudvīpo bhavaiṣyati /  ālayaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ vistareṇa samantataḥ // MvyK_6 //  ṛddhisphītā janapadā adaṇḍā anupadravāḥ /  tatra kāle bhaviṣyanti narās te śubhakarminaḥ // MvyK_7 //  akaṇṭakā vasumatī samāharitaśādvalā /  unnamantī namantī ca mṛdutūlapicūpamā // MvyK_8 //  akṛṣṭotpadyate śāli- madhunāś ca sugandhi ca /
tgt_original: 是時，閻浮提地，長十千由旬，廣八千由旬，平坦如鏡，名華軟草遍覆其地；

src_original: cailavṛkṣā bhaviṣyanti nānāraṅgopaśobhitāḥ // MvyK_9 //  puṣpapatraphalotpatā vṛkṣāś ca krośam ucchritāḥ /
tgt_original: 種種樹木，華果茂盛，其樹悉皆高三十里； 城邑次比，鷄飛相及。

src_original: aśītivarṣasahasrāṇi āyus teṣāṃ bhaviṣyati // MvyK_10 //  nirāmayāś ca te satvā vītaśokā mahotsavāḥ /  varṇavanto mahāśakhyā mahānāgabalāc citāḥ // MvyK_11 //
tgt_original: 人壽八萬四千歲，智慧威德、色力具足，安隱快樂；

src_original: trayā rogā bhaviṣyanti icchā anaśanaṃ jarā /
tgt_original: 唯有三病——一者、便利，二者、飲食，三者、衰老——女人年五百歲，爾乃行嫁。
